decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990. | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s): P01 (existing elevations and window schedule), P02 (proposed elevations and window schedule), P03 (site location and block plan), P04 (proposed window detail).
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building, unless otherwise stated in the submitted application form or approved drawings.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
subdivision_of_building:
Front Mid Floor -1st Floor (Flat 3 & Flat 4)
Rear Mid Floor - 1st Floor (Flat 5)
description: Change of windows for 3 individual flat leaseholders (total 7 flats in the building over 3 floors). The windows specification, style and size will be like for like. Change from single pane glass to double glazing and from timber frame to wood effect uPVC. Existing windows are sash windows and new windows will also be sash windows. Other than the glazing and the different materials the windows will look unchanged.
